title: Nested Data
code:
§begin nested
  ship ← §create_map
  crew ← §create_map
  crew["captain"] ← "Rodriguez"
  crew["engineer"] ← "Chen"
  ship["name"] ← "Discovery"
  ship["crew"] ← crew
  §transmit ship["crew"]["captain"]
§end
solution_description: creates nested dictionaries and accesses deeply nested values
hints: crew is a dictionary stored inside ship
